audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: This is an aspirational vision statement, not a description of functional optimization. No specific process or efficiency gain is described.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: While the organization is named, this is a high-level strategic statement without measurable outcomes or specific operational improvements.
audited_claims.notes: Vision statement lacks substance for Tier 1 assessment - no operational optimization described

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. Most claims focus on optimizing existing government service delivery functions, though many are aspirational rather than implemented. Only C3 provides concrete evidence of functional optimization.
